i<len; i++){\n            Robot robot = new Robot(i, positions[i], healths[i], directions.charAt(i));\n            list.add(robot);\n        }\n\n        Collections.sort(list, (a,b)-> a.pos-b.pos);\n\n        Stack<Robot> st = new Stack<>();\n\n        for(int i=0;
